chariot 1.1.0
  • Reference
  • Changelog

Lookup the RxNorm Ingredients of an ATC Class

Source: R/x_lookup_atc_class_ingredients.R
lookup_atc_class_ingredients.Rd

List all the RxNorm Ingredients that belong to an ATC Class.

lookup_atc_class_ingredients(
  conn,
  conn_fun = "connectAthena()",
  vocab_schema = "omop_vocabulary",
  atc_concept_obj,
  cache_only = FALSE,
  skip_cache = FALSE,
  override_cache = FALSE,
  render_sql = FALSE,
  verbose = FALSE,
  sleepTime = 1
)

See also

cli_h1,cli_alert render

Examples

library(tidyverse)
library(chariot)

lookup_atc_class_ingredients(atc_concept_obj = 21601787)

#> 
#> ── Retrieve Concept Object ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────
#> 
#> ── Is Concept Id Valid Integer? ────────────────────────────────────────────────
#> ✓ Concept Id is a valid integer
#> 
#> ── Lookup Concept Id in Concept Table ──────────────────────────────────────────
#> Connecting using PostgreSQL driver
#> [2021-01-09 15:22:06]	Postgres connection to 'athena' closed
#> ✓ Concept Id `21601787` found in Concept Table
#> 
#> ── Lookup Synonyms ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
#> Connecting using PostgreSQL driver
#> [2021-01-09 15:22:06]	Postgres connection to 'athena' closed
#> 
#> ── Lookup 'Maps to' Concept Names ──────────────────────────────────────────────
#> Connecting using PostgreSQL driver
#> [2021-01-09 15:22:06]	Postgres connection to 'athena' closed
#> 
#> ── QA Concept Object ───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
#> ✓ Concept belongs to ATC Vocabulary
#> ✓ Concept is an OMOP vocabulary class
#> 
#> ── Render & Query ──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
#> Connecting using PostgreSQL driver
#> [2021-01-09 15:22:07]	Postgres connection to 'athena' closed
#> # A tibble: 1 x 10
#>   concept_id concept_name domain_id vocabulary_id concept_class_id
#>        <dbl> <chr>        <chr>     <chr>         <chr>           
#> 1    1308216 lisinopril   Drug      RxNorm        Ingredient      
#> # … with 5 more variables: standard_concept <chr>, concept_code <chr>,
#> #   valid_start_date <date>, valid_end_date <date>, invalid_reason <chr>

lisinopril_class <- get_concept(concept_id = 21601787)
